effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.x_y: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
